channel.title: [PI]How to find the coordinates of a place?
channel.description: In my server, there is some unwork ladders. e.g. white knight castle. The ladder there dun work so i m trying to fix it, but I dun know the coordinates of castle war floor 2, any1 can tell me how to find it ?

item.title: [PI]How to find the coordinates of a place?
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

[quote=“deathnote777, post:1, topic:385641”]In my server, there is some unwork ladders. e.g. white knight castle. The ladder there dun work so i m trying to fix it, but
I dun know the coordinates of castle war floor 2, any1 can tell me how to find it ?[/quote]

The same coordinates as the ground height or the third height. (x y z)
Just use the command if you have one, or what ever then in what ever your trying to do.

The coords will probably be in a param looking a little like this,

0000, 0000, 0
The extra 0 would be the height, you want the second floor so use ‘1’.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]How to find the coordinates of a place?
